_learningOutcomes.outcome: Evaluate how to customise the definition of open data for different communities and requirements
Understand the operational and financial value of data to your organisation
Create a tailored pitch for the value of open data to your business
Deliver an open data pitch to a group of senior decision makers
Evaluate open data pitches for accuracy and effectiveness
